description: The Clinical Relationship segment contains the data necessary to relate two data elements within and/or external to the message at run-time. It also includes information about the relationship.

1.name: Set ID - REL
1.description: This field contains the Set ID of the specific relationship Record.

10.name: Assertor Contact
10.description: This field contains the address of the Person or Organization that asserted the relationship.

11.name: Assertion Date Range
11.description: This field contains the date range during which assertion of the relationship took place.

12.name: Negation Indicator
12.description: This field contains the date range relevant to the assertion of the relationship.
12.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

13.name: Certainty of Relationship
13.description: This field contains the certainty of existence of the relationship.

14.name: Priority No
14.description: This field contains the priority number as used, for example, in relative ordering, plans, and workflows.

15.name: Priority Sequence No (rel preference for consideration)
15.description: This field contains the priority sequence number as used, for example, in relative preference for consideration.

16.name: Separability Indicator
16.description: This field indicates whether source and target can be interpreted independently.
16.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

2.name: Relationship Type
2.description: This field contains the type of the relationship.

3.name: This Relationship Instance Identifier
3.description: This field contains the instance identifier of this relationship.

4.name: Source Information Instance Identifier
4.description: This field contains the Instance ID of the Source Segment.

5.name: Target Information Instance Identifier
5.description: This field contains the Instance ID of the Target Segment.

6.name: Asserting Entity Instance ID
6.description: This field contains the Instance ID of the Person or Organization that asserted the relationship.

7.name: Asserting Person
7.description: This field contains the Identifier details of the Person who asserted the relationship.
7.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number and Name for Persons

8.name: Asserting Organization
8.description: This field contains the Identifier details of the Organization that asserted the relationship.
8.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name and Identification Number for Organizations

9.name: Assertor Address
9.description: This field contains the address of the Person or Organization that asserted the relationship.
